pr_title: Add logging line with cluster name

timeline.message: Add logging line with cluster name

timeline.bodyText: This makes it print before the message "Hazelcast Jet  starting", that line should come first I think.
timeline.author: mtopolnik

replies.bodyText: @mtopolnik, we have a fine level logging for "... Hazelcast Serialization..." right after "Hazelcast Jet starting",  should I place after this?
replies.author: caioguedes

replies.bodyText: I think it will be fine below the Hazelcast Jet starting line since the fine log level signals lower importance.
replies.author: mtopolnik

replies.bodyText: Ok, I changed the order and also moved the logging to a method like the other. :D
replies.author: caioguedes
